blue.name: Ford Blue
blue.financial: 2024 Revenue: $72.8B, EBIT: $9.3B (12.8% margin), Wholesale Units: 2,279K, Strong profitability, Cash generator
blue.marketing: Brand loyalty: 65.1% (trucks), Traditional dealer network, Heritage-based positioning, Customer satisfaction: 79 ACSI
blue.management: Cost leadership focus, Traditional hierarchical management, Experienced leadership, Conservative culture
blue.operations: Efficient ICE manufacturing, 14 US plants, Legacy platform expertise, Excess capacity challenge, Mature supply chain
blue.strategic_position: Cost leadership in ICE segment, Declining market share in evolving market, Strong short-term position
blue.framework_fit_score: 9/10 - Strong alignment between strategy and execution

model_e.name: Ford Model e

model_e.marketing: Innovation-focused messaging, Direct-to-consumer exploration, Lower brand loyalty 41.5%, Younger demographic targeting
model_e.management: Startup-like culture, Emergence emphasis, Autonomous decision-making, Mission-driven employees
model_e.operations: New EV-dedicated facilities, BlueOval SK vertical integration, Battery supply chain focus, Capacity ramping
model_e.strategic_position: Market penetration in EVs, Competitive pricing pressure, Strategic positioning for future, Execution challenges
model_e.framework_fit_score: 4/10 - Strategy-execution misalignment; demand slower than projected

pro.name: Ford Pro
